summary: 27 textures redone + 3 textures from other authors.
descriptionHtml:
Re-texture of interior main beam  in Windelhelm, floor in High Hrothgar, rusty shovel, wall decorations, small nord tent, rugs and banners, practice dummy and linen.

My first textures so they might not be so good, feedback and suggestion for improvement or specific textures to retex are welcome.

I\'m a total noob at photoshop so if anyone fixes any \"texture bugs\" it will be appreciated,  I\'ll include it in my pack and you\'ll be credited in the description.

If something is lore unfriendly, tell me and I\'ll try to fix it.

SMIM overrides my wallBaskets01Details01 (feathers) by applying his quill texture of different name to his 3D feathers. This means that wallBaskets01Details01 will not be rendered on any object in the game with SMIM installed.

Textures\\		
->Clutter\\practiceDummy01, wallBasket01, wallBaskets01Details01, civilwarbannerburnt01, civilwarbanners01
---->Common\\rug01-08, rugRound01-02, shovel01
---->Ruins\\ruinsLinen01-02

->Architecture\\
---->highHrothgar\\hhfloor01
---->tents\\smallNordTent
---->Windhelm\\whWoodBaseInterior01
---->Whiterun\\wrCastleCarpet01-02, wrcitybannerinside01, wrcitybannerinsidetall01-02, wrrug01

[line]
[size=4]Credits:[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28185]high realistic tundra moss[/url] by Aron Uploaded by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3212020]Hein84[/url] (yellow variant) 
landscape\\tundramosstest01

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2836]HD Sacks Retexture[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2836]Mazarin[/url] (Type B)
clutter\\containers\\miscbag01-02 (4 textures with normals)
author: Toffer
